renderingProperty.name: Show more map detail
renderingProperty.description: Increase amount of map detail shown

renderingProperty.name: Show contour lines
renderingProperty.description: Display in map if available (zoom level 14 and up). Separate SRTM-file may be needed.

renderingProperty.name: Rendering mode
renderingProperty.description: Map optimization for respective User Profile

renderingProperty.name: No polygons
renderingProperty.description: Make all areal land features on map transparent
